curam.common.util.xml.dom

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.common.util.xml.dom.Content
      • curam.common.util.xml.dom.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomWrapper

    public class Comment
extends Content
    A Comment defines an XML element. This implementation wraps a dom4j Comment.
